text: # 6.2 Guideline update In this guideline, the GDG prioritized seven algorithms.Additional algorithms that will be covered in a future version of this guideline will include the use of HPV mRNA detection, DNA methylation, p16/Ki-67 dual-staining cytology and automated visual evaluation.
